attributes.action: Re open Whipsnade ZSL Zoo now!
attributes.additional_details:
Zoo’s must be allowed to re open. 
School’s are opening, shops are opening and there’s more people in an enclosed area in a shop than they would be in an open air Zoo! 
Shops open for non essential goods on 15th June, so please for the animals sake all our sakes, PLEASE RE OPEN OUR ZOO’S.
attributes.background:
Re open Whipsnade and London ZSL Zoo’s. 
Whipsnade does amazing work with breeding animals that could become extinct.
There work with animal and marine conservation is so important to everyone.  
If you re open they can use entrance fee’s to stay open, rather than funding from the Government.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Allow Zoos and Wildlife attractions to reopen with social distancing in place: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323881

Provide financial help to zoos, aquariums, & rescue centres during the pandemic: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308733

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you find out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips

You can read impartial analysis of the Government response to coronavirus and policy developments here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/coronavirus/

You may also be interested to know that because of the large number of petitions that have been started in relation to coronavirus, the Petitions Committee has been questioning the Government about its response to the coronavirus outbreak.
 
Find out more: https://committees.parliament.uk/work/192/the-governments-response-to-coronavirus/
